text:
viqSvaka#rmAq vi dyAmaurNO$n mahiqnA viqSvaca#kShAH || 
ki(gg) sviqdvanaqM ka uq sa vRuqkSha A#sIqdyatOq dyAvA#pRuthiqvI ni#ShTataqkShuH | 
manI#ShiNOq mana#sA pRuqcCatEduq tadyadaqddhyati#ShThaqd Buva#nAni dhAqrayann# || 
yA tEq dhAmA#ni paraqmANiq yA&vaqmA yA ma#ddhyaqmA vi#SvakarmannuqtEmA | 
SikShAq saKi#ByO haqviShi# svadhAvaH svaqyaM ~Mya#jasva taqnuva#M juShAqNaH || 
vAqcaspati#M ~MviqSvaka#rmANamUqtayE# - [  ] 10
